name: Prototype: Infinite
description:
A prototype was made in Cocos Creator for the subject "Rapid Prototyping".

The theme for this projects was "One key"

Instructions:

Drop the balls into the basket to earn 10 points.

If a ball does not enter the basket you will have it again but instead of 10 points it will only award 9

Controlls:

Press SPACE to open the door and drop the balls.
